metadata.title: CVE-2019-15223 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.1.8. There is a NULLpointer dereference caused by a malicious USB device in thesound/usb/line6/driver.c driver.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15223` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-4.13.0-16-lowlatency - 4.13.0-16.19
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-16-generic - 4.13.0-16.19
No subscription required

linux-image-5.0.0-31-generic - 5.0.0-31.33~18.04.1
linux-image-5.0.0-31-generic-lpae - 5.0.0-31.33~18.04.1
linux-image-5.0.0-31-lowlatency - 5.0.0-31.33~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.0.0-31-generic - 5.0.0-31.33~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.0.0-31-lowlatency - 5.0.0-31.33~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1002-oem - 4.15.0-1002.3
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1002-kvm - 4.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1001-aws - 4.15.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.0.0-1022-azure - 5.0.0-1022.23~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1001-gcp - 4.15.0-1001.1
linux-image-extra-4.15.0-1001-gcp - 4.15.0-1001.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1030-gke - 4.15.0-1030.32
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.0.0-1020-gke - 5.0.0-1020.20~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1007-oracle - 4.15.0-1007.9
No subscription required

linux-image-4.13.0-1005-raspi2 - 4.13.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1077-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1077.82
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.13.0-16.19').
linux-hwe package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.0.0-31.33~18.04.1').
